title: Cowboy Mike and Winston Go to the Racetrack
description: Here’s a book every child should read,Cowboy Mike has a friend he wants you to meet,On the Mountain Ranch, with Winston the Pony,Tag along; you’ll never feel lonely,The two pals spend their day as happy as can be,Meet friends roam the ranch wild and free,You learn something new with every page of the book,So what are you waiting for? Take a look.Presenting a new illustrated book for children, based on the adventures of a miniature pony and his owner, but more importantly, his best bud, Cowboy Mike.As the two pals go to the race track to learn how horses are trained to be champions and they meet a horse racing trainer names Molly Anderson who spends the day with them learning all about how these horses are trained.., Have your child feed their curiosity and learn something new with each page. Watch your child’s eyes light up as they immerse themselves in the vivid illustration etched with care and, most importantly, the love of learning and storytelling.Cowboy Mike And Winston Go to The Racetrack is the perfect blend of entertainment and education and is part of the Cowboy Mike and Winston series. Make it a part of your children’s bedtime read as they fall asleep, only to wake up the next day wanting to spend their “day in the life” as productive as Cowboy Mike and Winston.Joint Winston and Cowboy Mike on their Blue Mountain Ranch as they embark on their exciting adventures.To make things more wholesome, proceeds from each book purchase will go straight to a 501c3 charity named “Pony4Precious.” It is an organization set up by the real Cowboy Mike, who rescued a pony named Winston in 2016. The organization offers free online education and training programs for children all around the world.Let’s make every day in the life of our children prosperous.To learn more about Pony4Precious, visit their website
author: Michael Eastwood
